Attribute.Description: Indicates the active state of the Incident/other order
This is Y if its an other order
Captures the Incident's status in the ROSS system
Dispatch ID of the incident in the ROSS system , used as reference in the ICBS
Mapped with complex indicator in the ROSS system. Used as reference in the ICBS.
Account/Financial Code in the ROSS system, user will enter the ICBS specific account codes based on this attribute. Used as reference in ICBS.
Financial Fiscal Year in ROSS for the financial code, used as reference in ICBS
Start number for request number block, all the ICBS initiated Request/Issue should fall under start and end request number
End number for request number block, all the ICBS initiated Request/Issue should fall under start and end request number
To capture ROSS GeographicCoordinateLatitude field for reference
To capture ROSS GeographicCoordinateLongitude field for reference
Captures the last time the incident information was fetched from ROSS.
Determines if a incident is suppressive or not
Name of message sent that is reason for Lock
City for a Shipping Instruction shipping method
State for a Shipping Instruction shipping method

Entity.Description: Stores a relationship between an item and supplier

Attribute.Description: Issue Number which generated this record
This is the trackable ID - Property Number
This the most recent acquisition cost. If more than one property number has the same acquisition cost, multiple records are returned. - Acquisition Cost
This is the acquisition date/purchase date of the item from the vendor.- Acquisition Date
This cost will be obtained from the last transaction. - WO Service Cost
This is the cache that actually owns the property. TAG - Item Extenssion - Owner Unit ID
The following status codes will be defined: (I) Issued; (T) Transferred; (A) Available, but not in Kit; (K) In Kit; (D) Disposed; (W) Workordered; (P) Pending
description for the status - The following status codes will be defined: (I) Issued; (T) Transferred; (A) Available, but not in Kit; (K) In Kit; (D) Disposed; (W) Workordered; (P) Pending
If at Cache, Cache ID the item is contained at.
If at Incident, Incident number the item is assigned to.
If at Incident, year of incident the item is contained at.
If at Incident, Customer Unit ID of the Incident the item is assigned to.
Incident number for the last transaction.
Customer ID (This is the shipping unit ID) of the last Incident.
The type of the last transaction. Need to get LOV from NWCG
Document number of last transaction for example, Issue number
This is the item price from yfs_item_price_set when this item was issued.
If item is part of kit, this is the item ID of the kit this component is part of
If item is part of kit that has its own trackable ID, this is the trackable ID of the kit this component is part of
The item ID of the primary kit (if applicable)
The property number of the primary kit (if applicable)
Master Work Order Key - auto generated
master work order number - will be same as the return number incase this master work order is from returns
master work order node - node where this mwo will be executed
mwo type - if it is a manual or a return
Incident which for which the return is created
Incident which for which the return is created
Master Work Order Line Key - auto generated
master work order node - node where this mwo will be executed
mwo type - if it is a manual or a return
Incident which for which the return is created
Incident which for which the return is created

Entity.Description: NWCG Incident Order Contact Info table

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of the Contact Info
Key to the Incident Order. each row in this custom table should have a record in NWCG_INCIDENT_ORDER table
Free text info on the Name of the contact - usualy a person's name or something like General Office Phone
Free text contact info - i.e phone number
Type of contact, Shipping or Requesting

Entity.Description: NWCG Incident Order ROSS Account Codes table

Attribute.Description: Primary Key of the ROSS Account Code table
Key to the Incident Order. each row in this custom table should have a record in NWCG_INCIDENT_ORDER table
Last Financial Code which was active before this
Unique key for Issue Trackable List
Issue Number which generated this record
Unique ID across all the resource reassignment requests - not individual line
Column to store Resource Reassignment Message
Status - NOT_READY_TO_TRIGGER, READY_TO_TRIGGER, PROCESSED as of now
Primary key for Serial Record Table
